Hi, I'm Koichi.

Some people call me Koh. I'm a Cognitive Science student interested in Brain-Machine Interfaces and Machine Learning. Originally from Japan, I'm currently an international student at De Anza College, CA.

Keep up with me on Twitter or LinkedIn. Discover more about me on my about page.
